summary: This document is an email chain between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding a draft PowerPoint presentation for the defense closing in a case. The email discusses finalizing slides, including a 'fake photo as suggested,' for printing before the end of the day.

persons.name: Sunny
persons.context: Mentioned as needing time to print copies of the defense PowerPoint slides before the end of the day.

events.title: Preparation of Defense Closing PowerPoint
events.description: U.S. Attorney's Office personnel exchange emails to finalize a draft PowerPoint presentation for a defense closing, which includes summary slides and exhibits such as a 'fake photo as suggested.'

keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated September 24, 2021, concerning the preparation of a defense closing PowerPoint.
The PowerPoint includes a 'fake photo as suggested' among its exhibits.
The correspondence involves personnel from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email indicates urgency, as slides needed to be finalized for printing by the end of the day.
